text.p: Prix Vermeille, group one race for three-year-old fillies,
run over one and a half miles (2.4 kms):
Distances: A head, short neck, neck.
Winner owned by Matthews Breeding and Racing and trained in
Pari-Mutuel (includes a one-franc stake): Win 30.10; places
Prix Niel, a group two race for three-year-old colts and
fillies, run over one and a half miles (2.4 kms):
Distances: One length, a length and a half, one length.
Winner owned by Enrique Sarasola and trained in France by
Pari-Mutuel (includes a one-franc stake): Win 1.80; places
Prix de la Salamandre, a group one race for two-year-old
colts and fillies, run over seven furlongs (1.4 kms):
Distances: Three lengths, short head, a neck.
Winner owned by Robert Sangster and trained in England by
Pari-Mutuel (includes a one france stake): Win 3.10; places
3.70, 7.10. Straight Forecast 11.70. Value to the winner in the
Prix Foy, a group three race for four-year-old and upwards
colts and fillies, run over one and a half miles (2.4 kms):
Distances: Half a length, three lengths, three-quarters.
Winner owned by Sheikh Mohammed and trained in France by
Pari-Mutuel (includes a one-franc stake): Win 2.00; places
